reviews.review_msg: Unprofessional. In her ENG 398 class we required 3-4 books for her class when I asked if she could put the books on reserve at the library she told me no & asked me y I didnt buy the texts, when I told her I couldnt afford it she asked me what major Im in & dont textbooks cost more when I told her theyre free she just told me to figure it ou
